services.title: Amazon RDS
services.description: Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale a relational database in the cloud. Supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server, and MariaDB.

services.title: Amazon Aurora
services.description: MySQL and PostgreSQL-compatible relational database built for the cloud. Performance and availability of commercial-grade databases at 1/10th the cost.

services.title: Amazon DynamoDB
services.description: Fast and flexible NoSQL database service for single-digit millisecond performance at any scale. Fully managed, multi-region, multi-active database.

services.title: Amazon DocumentDB
services.description: Fast, scalable, highly available MongoDB-compatible database service. Makes it easy to store, query, and index JSON data.

services.title: Amazon ElastiCache
services.description: Fully managed in-memory data store and cache service supporting Redis and Memcached. Sub-millisecond latency for real-time applications.

services.title: Amazon ElastiCache
services.description: Fully managed in-memory data store and cache service supporting Redis and Memcached. Sub-millisecond latency for real-time applications.

services.title: Amazon EC2
services.description: Elastic Compute Cloud provides secure, resizable compute capacity in the cloud. Wide selection of instance types optimized for different use cases.

services.title: Amazon Lightsail
services.description: Easy-to-use virtual private server (VPS) with simple management. Includes everything you need to launch your project quickly.

services.title: Amazon ECS
services.description: Elastic Container Service is a fully managed container orchestration service. Deep integration with AWS services for production workloads.

services.title: Amazon EKS
services.description: Elastic Kubernetes Service makes it easy to run Kubernetes on AWS without managing the control plane. Certified Kubernetes conformant.

services.title: AWS Lambda
services.description: Run code without provisioning or managing servers. Pay only for the compute time you consume. Supports multiple programming languages.

services.title: AWS Fargate
services.description: Serverless compute engine for containers. Works with both ECS and EKS. Eliminates the need to provision and manage servers.

services.title: Amazon S3
services.description: Simple Storage Service offers industry-leading scalability, data availability, security, and performance. Store and retrieve any amount of data at any time.

services.title: Amazon Glacier
services.description: Low-cost cloud storage service for data archiving and long-term backup. Secure, durable, and extremely low-cost storage for data that is rarely accessed.

services.title: Amazon EBS
services.description: Elastic Block Store provides persistent block storage volumes for EC2 instances. Designed for workloads requiring low-latency access.

services.title: Amazon EFS
services.description: Elastic File System provides simple, scalable, elastic file storage for use with AWS Cloud services and on-premises resources.

services.title: Amazon FSx
services.description: Fully managed third-party file systems. Supports Windows File Server, Lustre, NetApp ONTAP, and OpenZFS.
